text: Agents move towards their target location if their goal is REACH.
Agents move away from their target agent if their goal is AVOID.
Agents without a clear goal-based move tend to move randomly.
Agents with trait 'Quiet' prefer to move towards {location_A}.
Agents with trait 'Anxious' move away from locations with more than one other agent.
Agents with trait 'Talkative' prefer locations with other agents.
Only one agent can be in {location_B} at a time.
Agents who enter {location_C} tend to stay there for an extra turn.
If two agents try to enter the same empty location, the 'Calm' one yields (doesn't move).
If an agent's goal is INTERACT_WITH Agent X, and they reach Agent X, they swap locations on the next step.
